SENT.plain: Follicular lymphoma (FL) is one of the most common types of non-Hodgkin's lmphomas in the world
Diagnosis of FL is based on morphological and immunohistochemical characteristics found on tissue sections
Our project's aim is to develop computer-aided analysis tools on virtual slide images (VSI) of lymphoid tissues with the purpose of improving the FL grading performed in malignant follicles
In this paper, we focus on the first step of our work, an automated system for detecting follicles in VSI of lymphoid tissues
To mimic the human expert process, the system works on low-resolution CD20 images and maps the follicle boundaries on high-resolution H&E images
